channel.title: How do i make portals work
channel.description: k i added a zammy portal and i want it to lead to X: 3105 Y: 3934 if you can tell me how to do tha thanks

item.title: How do i make portals work
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Val Mod Val
item.description:
@Mod_Val wrote:

[quote=“DPreborn, post:2, topic:304049”]if(objectID == *ID*){ toX = 3105; toY = 3934; sM("Change this message to the message you want"); }[/quote]
Depends on the source, ill add a non-Delta base code.

case objectID: teleportToX = 3105; teleportToY = 3934; sendMessage("Message here"); break;

Really easy to understand.

Case objectId = the id of the object(s) so if your portals id was 1000, then case 1000:
Just find out where your cases are and put it to where you see fit.

Val​:heart:

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make portals work
